title: Algeria vigorously condemns terrorist attack in Mozambique
text: Algeria vigorously condemns the series of attacks perpetrated in the last few days in the district of Palma in the province of Cabo Delgado, in the north of Mozambique, leaving several deaths among the civilian population.

In these painful circumstances, Algeria extends its deep condolences to the grief-stricken families, reiterates its full solidarity with the Mozambican government, and is convinced that the brotherly people of Mozambique, forged by the experiences and ordeals it has experiences will be able to face, in unity and stability, the huge challenges imposed by this international scourge.
